translated: In Tibetan: Mi g.yo ba’i ’khor lo🔽Homage to Great Caṇḍa.🔽In the center of the blazing four-finger-width [maṇḍala], one should draw a sword,

analyzed: ra ka s+ya tri du__kha duh_kha la la tshhe da ya hum phat/_mtshhams rnams su om tshan

analyzed: par 'brel ba'i sor phyed pa'i 'phar ma'i bar du om a tsha lo tshi ta hum phat/_om

analyzed: ka ma na ta hum phat/_om ma ha man+ta pa la ka hu~m phat/_om b+hi g+ha nan ma ra ya hum
